contentrichtext.text: '''Yardley''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==People== ===Sportspeople=== * [[Bruce Yardley]], a former Australian cricketer * [[George Yardley]], a former NBA player * [[George Yardley (footballer)]], Scottish footballer * [[Jim Yardley (cricketer)]], English cricketer * [[Norman Yardley]], an English cricketer * [[William Yardley (cricketer)]], English cricketer ===Other people=== * [[Charles Yardley Turner]] * [[Doyle Yardley]] * [[Herbert Yardley]], an early American cryptographer * [[Jane Yardley]] * [[Jim Yardley]] * [[Jimmy Yardley]] * [[Jonathan Yardley]] * [[Mark Yardley]] * [[Robert Morris Yardley]] * [[Tracy Yardley]] * [[Vanessa Yardley]] * [[William Yardley]] * [[Yardley Chittick]] ==Places== * Yardley, a province of the former [[West Indies Federation]] * [[Yardley, Birmingham]], an area of Birmingham city * [[Birmingham Yardley (UK Parliament constituency)]], a constituency represented in the British House of Commons * [[South Yardley]] * [[Stechford and Yardley North]] * [[Yardley Chase]] * [[Yardley Court]] * [[Yardley Gobion]], Northamptonshire * [[Yardley Hastings]], Northamptonshire * [[Yardley Wood]] * [[Yardley, Pennsylvania]], United States * [[Yardley-Wilburtha Bridge]] ==Business== * [[Yardley of London]], an old-line British cosmetics brand {{Disambig|geo|surname}}
